reviewText: If you are like me, with a family, it is difficult to commit to live music lessons. In YOU SHOOK ME, Jennifer Gamble takes it step by step, covering rhythm and lead guitar. There is much more to this than the song YOU SHOOK ME: Jennifer explains lots of basic blues licks and techniques. These are the basic lessons in blues that I've wanted for a long long time. Simple maybe, but not easy for me to get from a book. Jennifer appears a little charmingly nervous, with a disarming smile and manner that shows she really cares about her students and whether they get the lesson or not. Couldn't ask for more.
